DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate incidence severe hypoxemia episode intubation procedure two method pre-oxygenation : 1 . NIV ( Non Invasive Ventilation ) 2 . HFNC ( High-flow nasal canula oxygen therapy )
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Pre-oxygenation NIV HFNC Therapy Intubation ICU Patients With Acute Respiratory Failure
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Clinical randomized , open , multicenter , comparative trial , parallel group aim evaluate medical device . Selection patient admit ICU acute respiratory failure , require endotracheal intubation . Randomized study , inclusion two group : NIV HFNC . Experimental group : NHFC group , preoxygenation NHFC : oxygen flow rate 60 L / min 100 % FiO2 . Control group : NIV group , preoxygenation NIV : pressure support set exhale tidal volume 6-8 ml / kg ideal body weight , PEEP 5 cm H2O FiO2 100 % . Duration participation patient : 28 day
DOC.criteria: Main inclusion Criteria : acute hypoxemic respiratory failure require endotracheal intubation Main exclusion Criteria : coma NIV contraindication
